duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate patients and determine diagnosis, prognosis, and plan of care.
Implement therapeutic procedures, equipment devices, and teaching interventions to achieve patient's goals.
Perform teaching responsibilities and serve as a mentor for less experienced therapists and support personnel.
Demonstrate initiative, set professional goals, and support an environment of idea sharing and feedback exchange.
Manage a defined caseload and perform all administrative responsibilities including data collection and record-keeping.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in Occupational Therapy or a related field
